snippet: A ritual to let freshmen blow off steam left 30 cadets injured, including 24 with concussions and one with a broken leg.
abstract: Nighttime pillow fight among freshman, annual event following tough summer training at United States Military Academy, turns into bloody brawl when some cadets fill their pillowcases with objects hard enough to cause serious injuries; West Point officials say all 30 injured cadets have returned to duty, and no disciplinary actions have been taken.
lead_paragraph: A ritual to let freshmen blow off steam left 30 cadets injured, including 24 with concussions and one with a broken leg.

headline.main: At West Point, Annual Pillow Fight Becomes Weaponized
headline.print_headline: At West Point, Cadets’ Annual Pillow Fight Becomes Weaponized

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
